verbose_text: She asked whether NICE Sugar (Normoglycaemia in Intensive Care Evaluation and Survival Using Glucose Algorithm Regulation), which improperly allowed use of capillary glucose testing with reagent strips, failing to reliably detect hypoglycemia, is going to lead us to " reject another excellent hypothesis because we used the wrong test.
evidence: Sugar (Normoglycaemia in Intensive Care Evaluation and Survival Using Glucose Algorithm Regulation), which improperly allowed use of capillary glucose
